name: Spacewatch (Sleepy Studios)
description:
Spacewatch is a procedurally generated pseudo-puzzle game. You are tasked with monitoring the solar system for threats as part of the "Solar System Space Watch". When a threat is detected, you need to send a transmission signal from your current planet to the distress planet.

However, you can only transmit signals between planets that have one or more mutual languages. You need to quickly decide the best possible route with the least amount of links to get the highest scores.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 30, the theme was "Connected Worlds".
